description: Detects when an internet hosted webdav share is mounted using the "net.exe" utility
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Windows Internet Hosted WebDav Share Mount Via Net.EXE
query: (((process.executable:(/.*\\\\[Nn][Ee][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Nn][Ee][Tt]1\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:(/[Nn][Ee][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Nn][Ee][Tt]1\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))) AND (process.command_line:/.*\ [Uu][Ss][Ee]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ [Hh][Tt][Tt][Pp].*/))
